ca.uol.aig.fts.phasecorrection
Class PhaseCorrection

java.lang.Object
  ca.uol.aig.fts.phasecorrection.PhaseCorrection

public class PhaseCorrection
extends java.lang.Object

Correct the phases of single-interferograms

Constructor Detail

PhaseCorrection

public PhaseCorrection(int dsLength,
                       int ssLength,
                       int phaseFittingdegree,
                       int pcfSize_h,
                       double weight_limit)
Constructor.

Parameters:
dsLength - the half size of the double-sided interferogram.
ssLength - the half size of the single-sided interferogram.
pcfSize_h - the half size of the phase-correction function.
weight_limit - used to remove insignificant points. The points whose amplitude is less than (weight_limit x amplitude maxima) will be not taken into account in the phase-fitting.

PhaseCorrection

public PhaseCorrection(int dsLength,
                       int ssLength,
                       int phaseFittingdegree,
                       int pcfSize_h,
                       double weight_limit,
                       int ZPD_index,
                       int interferogram_len)
Constructor.

Parameters:
dsLength - the half size of the double-sided interferogram.
ssLength - the half size of the single-sided interferogram.
pcfSize_h - the half size of the phase-correction function.
weight_limit - used to remove insignificant points. The points whose amplitude is less than (weight_limit x amplitude maxima) will be not taken into account in the phase-fitting.
ZPD_index - the position index of the ZPD.
interferogram_len - the total length of an interferogram.
Note: This constructor will use the position of ZPD to determine new values for dsLength and ssLength.
Method Detail

get_ssLength

public int get_ssLength()
get the size of the single-sided interferogram (half-size).

Returns:
the value of dsLength.

get_dsLength

public int get_dsLength()
get the size of the double-sided interferogram (half-size).

Returns:
the value of dsLength.

get_pcfSize

public int get_pcfSize()
get the size of the phase-correction function (full-size).

Returns:
the value of pcfSize.

getInterferogram

public double[] getInterferogram(double[] compositeInterferogram)
get the phase-corrected one-side interferogram.

Parameters:
compositeInterferogram - the composite interferogram, including a short double-side and a long one-side
Returns:
the phose-corrected one-side interferogram. The length of the phase-corrected interferogram is equal to (ssLength + 1).
